title: A little rant vid, How attitude can help win games.

embed.description: This is my first "Rant" video. I probably could have made it a little cleaner. Maraudaurs behavior tips: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/Lj5N4ZLb-want-some-tips-on-your-behaviour Story on how I went form Bronze 5 to Gold 5. http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/F3Ao6gEj-story-on-how-i-went-from-bronze-5-to-gold-5-without-a-duo

body:
TLDR- or TLDW
Just mute assholes you cant be reported that way.
Everyone feeds, everyone fucks up.

replies.body:
I just do /mute enemy at the start, and if my even one member of my team hints at flaming, an argument might break out and tilt me, so I just /mute team. Most of the time I do /mute all. Teammates ping a lot if they are signalling mia, objectives, kills, etc. No reason to chat with them.

They will ping if they want me to do something, and I can still type to them if I need to make a call that goes beyond pings.

 "I'm not here to make friends and XD and all that shit, I just wanna play the game" - Disco Heat 2016
Exactly just mute and play, you win more games.

Being toxic and tilting your opponent is a workable tactic at times, sort of like those fouls in physical sport games. What I don't get is how despite all these great vids and posts like yours being everywhere on the net, people still don't get the message. Right now I'm just wondering what to do when the team just gives up and trolls, losing the little hope we had left before surrendering

yeah it sucks, but the best thing you can do is mute/report them.
I even start pressing the record button, and submit a ticket to riot.

I kinda wish the punishment system was faster at times.
